a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average minutes spent on leisure activities, per day, by sex (ages 15-65). For most countries surveys were
conducted between 2009 and 2016, but surveys for some countries are older.
Note: Leisure activities include: sports, attending events, visiting friends, watching TV and other leisure activities.
